AzureBlade: No, I can assure you. I feel it. Besides, if I can 
convince him, he could be a fearsome maximal, no?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Alpha Dolphy:
> 
> "My name is Alpha"said the young femme "and I don't belive that any 
> goodness in a decepticon... They're evils... without goodness "
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > AzureBlade was spent from having been shot that much. He tried to 
> > stand, but fell to his knees.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: Thank you, Hell drak. You too, my friend, though I do 
> not 
> > know your name... I feel peaceful now... I think this enemy is 
> still 
> > online (Skullgrin). Maybe I can talk to his spark... I feel he has 
> > some goodness inside I could try help him develop...
> > 
> > OOC:If you dont want that lurker, just give me a sign and it'll 
> fail.
